item.description: The Fed is an independent government agency established by Congress.

item.title: WATCH: Footage of colossal squid captured on camera for the first time, scientists say
item.description: A juvenile colossal squid was spotted in its natural environment alive at a depth of almost 1,100 feet, according to the Schmidt Ocean Institute.

item.title: Pope Francis visits Roman prison after delegating some Holy Week duties
item.description: Francis delegated to two cardinals his role in presiding over this weekend's Easter masses, The Vatican Press Office said on Wednesday.
